short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rapidify Manual Testing - Add, Manage, Autofill QA Parameters. Store API Env Info for easy account access!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QA QuickFill allows manual users to maintain a diary of their test accounts, allowing them to quickly access test accounts based on their QA environment types such as PROD, STAGE and more! 

The extension also allows keeping track of additional information such as Type - a customizable text field for categorizing test accounts. 

Additionally, the test id's and associated params can also be stored for easy access. Lastly, knowing when an account was created helps understand the lifecycle of the account.

he extension also allows keeping track of additional information such as Type - a customizable text field for categorizing test accounts. 

Additionally, the test id's and associated params can also be stored for easy access. Lastly, knowing when an account was created helps understand the lifecycle of the account.
